Phrases.StudentShowcase: THIS GAME PRODUCTION IS A STUDENT SHOWCASE
Phrases.BuyQ: WANT TO BUY THE FULL EXPERIENCE FOR A FICTIONAL $1.00?
Phrases.Level1Completed: YOU'VE MADE IT THROUGH. GREAT JOB!
Phrases.BrowserText: This action will open content in your web browser (internet connection required)
Phrases.ThankYou:
THANK YOU FOR PLAYING UPRISE!
 YOU HAVE NOW REACHED THE END OF OUR STUDENT SHOWCASE 
 MORE LEVELS WILL BE ADDED IN THE FUTURE 
 BEST,
 LASER BUDDIES

LevelEnter.LevelEnter5: Good, now I just need to get to the top...

Vega.FirstLevelEntry: I need to reach the shuttle on the top floor...
Vega.FirstFloorTeleporter: I should be able to go through these teleporters...
Vega.FirstEnemyMeet: If these sentries spot me, this could be the shortest rescue mission...
Vega.FirstFFDMeet: I can’t hack this force field on my own...
Vega.FirstFFDMeet2nd: Maybe I can find something that can hack this thing...
Vega.LennonFound: Oh! This little fellow might be able to hack the computers...
Vega.FirstPrisonerMeet: So that’s how they hold other Hybrids captive...

PrisonerRescue.PrisonerRescue1: Don’t worry, I’ll get you out of here...
PrisonerRescue.PrisonerRescue3: I’ll make sure you get out of here, friend!
PrisonerRescue.PrisonerRescue4: You’ll be freed soon, trust me!
PrisonerRescue.PrisonerRescue5: I’ll set you free - just hang in there...

Vega.GlovesPickUp: Nice! With this, I can override the floor locks!

FirstWallTeleporter.FirstWallTeleporter1: This doorway ‘should’ work if aligned properly
FirstWallTeleporter.FirstWallTeleporter2: This teleporter could take me places, if I only knew how

Vega.FirstWireSystemMeet: There is something to these wires...
Vega.FirstHackableComputerMeet: If I connect this computer to something, it ‘should’ be hackable...
Vega.NotConnectedComputer: There is something to these wires...
Vega.NotConnectedComputer2nd: If I connect this computer to something, it ‘should’ be hackable...
Vega.StartDumbleDoor: I need to reach the top floor...

LevelComplete.LevelComplete3: I’m on my way, dad. Don’t worry!
LevelComplete.LevelComplete4: Hang in there, I’ll find you, dad...
LevelComplete.LevelComplete5: Another one down, still some to go...
LevelComplete.LevelComplete7: Oh, I can change the colors of the teleporters

Vega.ForTrailer: You can’t tell me what to do anymore, dad...

Lennon.FirstFound: I am a certified -license-to-hack-bot at your service!

Tutorial.TapOnFloor: Tap on floor to move Vega
Tutorial.BaseFloor: Drag the turning pivot to change perspective
Tutorial.FloorRotation: Drag on floors to turn them. \n You cannot drag the floor you’re standing on
Tutorial.PassiveFloor: You cannot drag the floor you’re standing on

Root.Credits: Laser Buddies Chris Bjerremose, Game Director Rasmus Danstrøm, Audio Designer Tudor Dragan, Programmer Thomas Ebeling, Level Designer Patrick Helledie, Project Manager Tim Skovbølle Holst, CG Artist Christian Hvistendal, CG Artist Andrea Keiser, QA and UX Manager Benjamin Legarth, QA and UX Manager Sayid Malekdoost, Lead Programmer Benjamin Maksuti, Programmer Kasper Passov, Pipeline Programmer Kai Ejler Rasmussen, QA Programmer Irina Stoynova, Programmer Tanja Lind Tankred, Game Designer Dilan Yüksel, Art Director Felicia Zimmerman, Animator Voice Actors Roger Paterson, Vega's father (English) Linnea Pihl, Vega (English) Chris Bjerremose, Vega's father (Danish) Tine Silke Lund, Vega (Danish) Special Thanks Jeppe Bisbjerg Thomas Howalt Rasmus Kock Simon Løvind Kirstine Ploug Kirsten Skytte Dennis Virlogeux Gunnar Wille Martin Ziir Play Testers Kristian Ahm Ann-Marie Bech Mille Krogh Carlsen Vlad Epure Stine Gjering Frederiksen Karoline Amalie Sandfeld Hansen Frederik Knudsen Alfred Kristiansen Emil Lagone Angela Manna Katharina Bregnhoved Mortensen Sacha Nielsen Annemette Falentin Nyborg Mikkel Stolborg Simon Stålhandske Gustav Timper Niclas Valentiner
